snippet: Officials gave few details about what prompted the temporary closings but cited “credible” information that an Al Qaeda affiliate might be plotting an attack.
abstract: Terrorism threat prompts United States to temporarily close dozens of American diplomatic missions in Middle East, North Africa and elsewhere; officials give few details but cite credible information that Al Qaeda affiliate might be plotting attack.
lead_paragraph: Officials gave few details about what prompted the temporary closings but cited “credible” information that an Al Qaeda affiliate might be plotting an attack.

headline.main: Terror Threat Prompts U.S. to Close Diplomatic Missions
headline.print_headline: Terror Threat Prompts U.S. To Close Diplomatic Missions
